author: igv4321
body: This backports PR #9286 and PR #9327. Note that I also had to modify DPGAnalysis/Skims/python/HighMETSkim_cff.py. In this backport the hcal noise filter stays in, as it originally was in 7_4_X. Note that 7_5_X removes the hcal noise filter from HighMETSkim altogether (which I find to be rather unexpected). Perhaps, @alkaloge who did this for 7_5_X can comment on the issue.
title: Further backport of hcal noise filters
